S.FORM: == Sing-kan 香港 == Sing-kan "igu: Hong Kong；mikelul misulit:HK／HKG", pulung pangangan Sing-kun picidekan a sin-cen-cu "igu: Hong Kong Special Administrative Region；mikelul misulit:HKSAR atu Hong Kong SAR, sadayumen singangan " minatu", sabangcalen kungangan " sien-cin", u Cung-hua-zen-min-kun-he-kuo nu tusaay a picidekan nu sin-cen-ci, u Cu-cen-san-ciw-cuo, Aw-kan-aw-ta-wan kitidaan, Ta-cung-hua kitidaan, Ya-tay-ti kitidaan a angangangan a macian, atu nu kitakiday nu macian. kitidaan pasuSing-kan subul, Ciw-lung atu " sin-cie", itida i Kun-tun-sen Cu-cien-kuo walian. lala' nu Sing-kan i nutipan a bayu amisan a dadipasan, miduduc tu amis tu Sen-cen sauwac sibiyaw tu Kun-tun-sen Sen-cen-se, nutipan silaad tu Cu-cen atu Aw-min, masasuayaw atu Cu-hay. 香港(英語:Hong Kong；縮寫:HK／HKG), :Hong Kong Special Administrative Region；縮寫:HKSAR或Hong Kong SAR),簡稱"港",雅稱"香江", . itida i Cung-kuo-ta-lu timulan, lala' i nutipan a Tay-pin-yen dadipasan nu makacuwacuwaay a kanatalan nu tatelungan, mangalayaca palaTay- pin-yen atu In-tu-yeng tu caculian. Sing-kan i kitakid nu kainai'an nu " sakalihalay a minatuan nu macian", sapahelak han mamin ku Sing-kan, nu duma a kitakidan nu sakalihalay a tataydaan u " sakalihalay nu minatuan a kitudaan", nuicapiay a minatuaan ku sasangaan tu sakalihalay nu minatu. sumamad, Sing-kan malaCung-kuo timulan atu wali timul nu cuwacuwaay a niyaduan malecad atu kitakidy nu kanatal a angangan nu sasasiwbayan, papapaliyunan tu sasasiwbayan nu tademaw a sakaudip. u Ya-tay kitidaan nu angangan a sasiwbayan , kakaydaan nu caculilan atu gingku. malamalahatay nu Ya-cuo angangan nu sasasiwbayan atu gingku nu tatelungan, kanatal nu sasasiwbayan atu kanatal nu ginginkuan nu tatelungan, sisakatulin tu lalabuay nu tademawan atu nu makacuwacuwaay a kitakidan nu aaedapan, kanatal nu syakay, kanatal a pahikukian atu tatelungan misiwbayay. . kapah hulic, syekay masasungaay, talakaw ku nipikuwan tu lice, pahelak sa misiwbay, sihu kapah ku nipisilud tu hekal nu misiwbayay, pahutin han a misiwbay, mahidatu adidi' ku damsu, madayumay a damsu, hua-ce atu se-hua masacacay. Sing-kan singanganaca tu " Tung-feng-ce-cu" a kanatal tabakiay a maci, "Sing-kan a payaan" u Sing-kan sihu sapisinding nu kiyakuan, micuduh tu Sing-kan u "Ya-cuo-kuo-ci-du-huy". Sing-kun mala i kitakiday u sakapahay nu kasinganganan. Amilika ci-cin-huy namaka cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku lima a mihcaan katukuh tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku siwa a mihcaan matulin maala i kitakid u sakalihalay nu cin-ci, tusa a malebut tusa a bataan mihcaan mikilul tu Sin-ciw-puo sakatusa ku nikasinganganan. itini i GaWC nipihapuan i kitakid nipisilacan, Sing-kan tu tusa a malebut tusa a bataan nu mihcaan mikilul tu Lun-tun, Niw-ye, u sakatusa nu macian " Alpha+". .而在GaWC "Alpha+"城市. sakatalaayaw nu wenday a sing-kun香港前途問題 Cung-hua-min-kuo-zen-min-kun-he-kuo mapatideng, u wayway nu Cung-kuo sihu: Sing-kan u lala' nu Cung-kuo, caay palutatengan ku Cung-kuo tu tuluay a nikasasulitan tu cudadan, saan tu kapahay a demiadan masasakamu tu ahicaen mikaykic tu wenday nu Sing-kan, caay henay kalaheci kina kawaw mahida henay. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku tusa a mihcaan tulu a bulad walu a demiad, hina enengay nu Cung-kuo itida i Len-he-kuo ci Hun-hua patayda tu cudad i Len-he-kuo-huy-ce-min-hua tu sakakaay, mihantay tu Sing-kan atu Aw-min " sapihantayaw a nipihapuan", tu tidaay muenengay a niyadu'an a nganganan. . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku tulu a mihcaan cacay a bulad cacay a demiad, ci May-li-ha itida: Governor to the Rt. Hon. Sir Alec Douglas-Home, K.T., M.P. tu : cinida "u Sing-kun" a sepat a lasubu nu wang a binacadan atu sihu nu heni miida tu sakatahekal nu tuudan a sapacunus sapikaykic tu sakaudip atu sapicunus a kalisiw, dumasatu amikeda tu kawaw nu Cung-kuo a cen-ce'. amica ku nipiadih tu kapahay tunuduma a tademaw idaw ku yadahay nu balucu', ahicaen caay pakayadah tu nisimsiman nu binacadan kya caay ka lawilaw, saan ahicaen misatalakaw tu nikaudipah, sapipaculiyaw tu ba'ket nu udip, nika saan kaku caay kaw nu aydaay a Sing-kan a nisimsiman. saan ku nuheni itida i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku pitu nu mihcaan nikangalayan, Sing-kan sakay balucu' nuheni idaw ku tatengaay tu sakay tu nuhenian, u tataydaan nu henia nu sakaudip a tataydaan. 1973年1月1日,麥理浩在"Governor to the Rt. Hon. Sir Alec Douglas-Home, K.T., M.P."稱:"它 ." kautiihan過渡期 caysiwwalsep mihcaan atu caysiwsiwsep mihcaan nu Sing-kan caysiwwallim mihcaan pitu a bulat cacay a dimiadan, lalabuay nu Cung-kuo atu Sing-kan lima a bataan idaw ku siwa nu tademawan misakaput tu Sing-kan picidekan tu sin-cen niyadu'an hucunu a wi-yen-huy, sabaw tusa a bulat tusa a bataan idaw ku walu a demiadan, caysiwwalsiw mihcaan enem a bulat sepat a demiad, Pei-ci mapalekal ku cen-ce-hun-paw, pinaay nu lasubuan a binacadan tayda i patiyamay mapulung masilsil muculil. maadihaca ku mabulaway nu Sing-kan, u zaysang maselep, sihu nu Sing-kan idaw ku nipicuduh tu Sing-kan pahikukian tu kiyaku sapihinum tu balucu'. pitu a bulad, Ing-kuo itidaay i Sing-cia-puo ci Michael Pike namapapatelay atu ci Li-kun-yaw, ci Li-kun-yaw talaayaw musakamu tu sakalahat nu Sing-kun, kinatusa musakamu tu sakay Ing-kuo hidantu ku nipiduduc tu " Cung-Ing nikapulungan a nakamuan" " ma'dem i balucu'", saan Sing-kan a tademaw tu nika amelikan tu nikakapah a min-cu-ce-tu u "nika hemekan a nikatalakawan". 1985年7月1日, Michael Pike ". saan ci Li-kun-yaw, Sing-kan a tademaw caay palutatengan tu Cung-kuo tunikasidaitan, saan ku Cung-kuo caay piala tu canacanan nu masakaputay tu nipiadih u " sapihantayay" a waywayan, kanahatu Sing-kun idaw ku talakaway nu " kaw-tu-ce-ce'", mikainami ku Cung-yen tu canacanan a " nikaliyas, min-cu-ci-cu, tadaudip nu binacadan", saan, pabelien ku duma nu Sing-kan a niyadu'an tu Cung-kuo, Sing-kan a tademaw aminanam tu "sakay ngaay tu Cung-kuo", anu mahicahica ku nabalucuan nuheni. Cung-yen uydasa ku alaen tu nikaydaan nuheni a nisausian, mikelec mihaymaw tu nikatalaayawan, kiya kapah ku culil nu Sing-kan. 李分析, . demiad氣候 demiad nu Hungkun香港氣候 caay kaw caledesay ku Hungkun, kasaliwsiwan taneng ku caledes sienaw, alahican matulin ku kenukenutan nu pina a lalipayan ku demiad, halehem sengesengetan, hina baliyus tu tabakiay. tu teban nu mihcaan, Tay-pin-yeng malacaledesay, mahiniay nu laludan pasayda ku bali i O-ya talu, Sing-kan siladay tu udad kalasengesengeten a laludan. lalud kasaliwsiwan tusa a puu'an u kabaliyusa, alahican malananum atu lanu' namakabuyu' tu nikacascasan, hina caledes itida, mahida u Sen-ing-sin-seng mala mihcaan nu Sing-kan kinapinaan tu nikataydaan nu caledes alahican matala caledestu, udad hantu mihidatu tu mihmihcaan. sabaw tusa katukuh tu sakatusa a mihcaan tu tusa a bulatan u kasienawan, kalaacakacakan ku sapi', katalakawan nu buyu alahican idaw ku suleda. .

== Sing-kan 香港 == Sing-kan "igo: Hong Kong；mikelol misolit:HK／HKG", polong pangangan Sing-kon picidekan a sin-cen-co "igo: Hong Kong Special Administrative Region；mikelol misolit:HKSAR ato Hong Kong SAR, sadayomen singangan " minato", sabangcalen kongangan " sien-cin", o Cong-hoa-zen-min-kon-he-koo no tosaay a picidekan no sin-cen-ci, o Co-cen-san-ciw-coo, Aw-kan-aw-ta-wan kitidaan, Ta-cong-hoa kitidaan, Ya-tay-ti kitidaan a angangangan a macian, ato no kitakiday no macian. kitidaan pasoSing-kan sobol, Ciw-long ato " sin-cie", itida i Kon-ton-sen Co-cien-koo walian. lala' no Sing-kan i notipan a bayo amisan a dadipasan, midodoc to amis to Sen-cen saowac sibiyaw to Kon-ton-sen Sen-cen-se, notipan silaad to Co-cen ato Aw-min, masasoayaw ato Co-hay. 香港(英語:Hong Kong；縮寫:HK／HKG), :Hong Kong Special Administrative Region；縮寫:HKSAR或Hong Kong SAR),簡稱"港",雅稱"香江", . itida i Cong-koo-ta-lo timolan, lala' i notipan a Tay-pin-yen dadipasan no makacowacowaay a kanatalan no tatelongan, mangalayaca palaTay- pin-yen ato In-to-yeng to cacolian. Sing-kan i kitakid no kainai'an no " sakalihalay a minatoan no macian", sapahelak han mamin ko Sing-kan, no doma a kitakidan no sakalihalay a tataydaan o " sakalihalay no minatoan a kitodaan", noicapiay a minatoaan ko sasangaan to sakalihalay no minato. somamad, Sing-kan malaCong-koo timolan ato wali timol no cowacowaay a niyadoan malecad ato kitakidy no kanatal a angangan no sasasiwbayan, papapaliyonan to sasasiwbayan no tademaw a sakaodip. o Ya-tay kitidaan no angangan a sasiwbayan , kakaydaan no cacolilan ato gingko. malamalahatay no Ya-coo angangan no sasasiwbayan ato gingko no tatelongan, kanatal no sasasiwbayan ato kanatal no ginginkoan no tatelongan, sisakatolin to lalaboay no tademawan ato no makacowacowaay a kitakidan no aaedapan, kanatal no syakay, kanatal a pahikokian ato tatelongan misiwbayay. . kapah holic, syekay masasongaay, talakaw ko nipikowan to lice, pahelak sa misiwbay, siho kapah ko nipisilod to hekal no misiwbayay, pahotin han a misiwbay, mahidato adidi' ko damso, madayomay a damso, hoa-ce ato se-hoa masacacay. Sing-kan singanganaca to " Tong-feng-ce-co" a kanatal tabakiay a maci, "Sing-kan a payaan" o Sing-kan siho sapisinding no kiyakoan, micodoh to Sing-kan o "Ya-coo-koo-ci-do-hoy". Sing-kon mala i kitakiday o sakapahay no kasinganganan. Amilika ci-cin-hoy namaka cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo siwa a bataan idaw ko lima a mihcaan katokoh tosa a malebot cacay a bataan idaw ko siwa a mihcaan matolin maala i kitakid o sakalihalay no cin-ci, tosa a malebot tosa a bataan mihcaan mikilol to Sin-ciw-poo sakatosa ko nikasinganganan. itini i GaWC nipihapoan i kitakid nipisilacan, Sing-kan to tosa a malebot tosa a bataan no mihcaan mikilol to Lon-ton, Niw-ye, o sakatosa no macian " Alpha+". .而在GaWC "Alpha+"城市. sakatalaayaw no wenday a sing-kon香港前途問題 Cong-hoa-min-koo-zen-min-kon-he-koo mapatideng, o wayway no Cong-koo siho: Sing-kan o lala' no Cong-koo, caay palotatengan ko Cong-koo to toloay a nikasasolitan to codadan, saan to kapahay a demiadan masasakamo to ahicaen mikaykic to wenday no Sing-kan, caay henay kalaheci kina kawaw mahida henay. cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo pito a bataan idaw ko tosa a mihcaan tolo a bolad walo a demiad, hina enengay no Cong-koo itida i Len-he-koo ci Hon-hoa patayda to codad i Len-he-koo-hoy-ce-min-hoa to sakakaay, mihantay to Sing-kan ato Aw-min " sapihantayaw a nipihapoan", to tidaay moenengay a niyado'an a nganganan. . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo pito a bataan idaw ko tolo a mihcaan cacay a bolad cacay a demiad, ci May-li-ha itida: Governor to the Rt. Hon. Sir Alec Dooglas-Home, K.T., M.P. to : cinida "o Sing-kon" a sepat a lasobo no wang a binacadan ato siho no heni miida to sakatahekal no toodan a sapaconos sapikaykic to sakaodip ato sapiconos a kalisiw, domasato amikeda to kawaw no Cong-koo a cen-ce'. amica ko nipiadih to kapahay tonodoma a tademaw idaw ko yadahay no baloco', ahicaen caay pakayadah to nisimsiman no binacadan kya caay ka lawilaw, saan ahicaen misatalakaw to nikaodipah, sapipacoliyaw to ba'ket no odip, nika saan kako caay kaw no aydaay a Sing-kan a nisimsiman. saan ko noheni itida i cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo enem a bataan idaw ko pito no mihcaan nikangalayan, Sing-kan sakay baloco' noheni idaw ko tatengaay to sakay to nohenian, o tataydaan no henia no sakaodip a tataydaan. 1973年1月1日,麥理浩在"Governor to the Rt. Hon. Sir Alec Dooglas-Home, K.T., M.P."稱:"它 ." kaotiihan過渡期 caysiwwalsep mihcaan ato caysiwsiwsep mihcaan no Sing-kan caysiwwallim mihcaan pito a bolat cacay a dimiadan, lalaboay no Cong-koo ato Sing-kan lima a bataan idaw ko siwa no tademawan misakapot to Sing-kan picidekan to sin-cen niyado'an hocono a wi-yen-hoy, sabaw tosa a bolat tosa a bataan idaw ko walo a demiadan, caysiwwalsiw mihcaan enem a bolat sepat a demiad, Pei-ci mapalekal ko cen-ce-hon-paw, pinaay no lasoboan a binacadan tayda i patiyamay mapolong masilsil mocolil. maadihaca ko mabolaway no Sing-kan, o zaysang maselep, siho no Sing-kan idaw ko nipicodoh to Sing-kan pahikokian to kiyako sapihinom to baloco'. pito a bolad, Ing-koo itidaay i Sing-cia-poo ci Michael Pike namapapatelay ato ci Li-kon-yaw, ci Li-kon-yaw talaayaw mosakamo to sakalahat no Sing-kon, kinatosa mosakamo to sakay Ing-koo hidanto ko nipidodoc to " Cong-Ing nikapolongan a nakamoan" " ma'dem i baloco'", saan Sing-kan a tademaw to nika amelikan to nikakapah a min-co-ce-to o "nika hemekan a nikatalakawan". 1985年7月1日, Michael Pike ". saan ci Li-kon-yaw, Sing-kan a tademaw caay palotatengan to Cong-koo tonikasidaitan, saan ko Cong-koo caay piala to canacanan no masakapotay to nipiadih o " sapihantayay" a waywayan, kanahato Sing-kon idaw ko talakaway no " kaw-to-ce-ce'", mikainami ko Cong-yen to canacanan a " nikaliyas, min-co-ci-co, tadaodip no binacadan", saan, pabelien ko doma no Sing-kan a niyado'an to Cong-koo, Sing-kan a tademaw aminanam to "sakay ngaay to Cong-koo", ano mahicahica ko nabalocoan noheni. Cong-yen oydasa ko alaen to nikaydaan noheni a nisaosian, mikelec mihaymaw to nikatalaayawan, kiya kapah ko colil no Sing-kan. 李分析, . demiad氣候 demiad no Hongkon香港氣候 caay kaw caledesay ko Hongkon, kasaliwsiwan taneng ko caledes sienaw, alahican matolin ko kenokenotan no pina a lalipayan ko demiad, halehem sengesengetan, hina baliyos to tabakiay. to teban no mihcaan, Tay-pin-yeng malacaledesay, mahiniay no lalodan pasayda ko bali i O-ya talo, Sing-kan siladay to odad kalasengesengeten a lalodan. lalod kasaliwsiwan tosa a poo'an o kabaliyosa, alahican malananom ato lano' namakaboyo' to nikacascasan, hina caledes itida, mahida o Sen-ing-sin-seng mala mihcaan no Sing-kan kinapinaan to nikataydaan no caledes alahican matala caledesto, odad hanto mihidato to mihmihcaan. sabaw tosa katokoh to sakatosa a mihcaan to tosa a bolatan o kasienawan, kalaacakacakan ko sapi', katalakawan no boyo alahican idaw ko soleda. .
